quiz.question: We are able to go to heaven when we believe in who?
quiz.additional_info: If you believe in Jesus and accept what He did for you, you will go to heaven. It's that easy!

quiz.question: Who was the Mother of Jesus?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus was fully human, but is also fully God!

quiz.question: Who's name actually means 'God Saves'?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus is who He says He is and He did save us!

quiz.question: Who was Jesus' earthly Father?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus lived a human life, but He is the Son of God!

quiz.question: Who baptized Jesus in the river Jordan?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus told John to baptize Him so that what God requires would be done.

quiz.question: Who is the Son of God?
quiz.additional_info: When Jesus was baptized a voice from heaven said "This is my dearly loved Son, who brings me great joy."

quiz.question: Who betrayed Jesus for 30 silver coins?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus lived a perfect, sinless life. He was betrayed and rejected by those He came to save.

quiz.question: Who denied Jesus three times before the rooster crowed?
quiz.additional_info: We all make mistakes but Jesus chose to take the punishment for those mistakes because He loves us.

quiz.question: Who does the Bible say ordered Jesus' to be crucified?
quiz.additional_info: The crucification of Jesus was also recorded by the Roman Senator Tacticus in historical documents.

quiz.question: Who sets us free from the power of sin and death?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus was victorious! His grace and mercy has set us free.

levels.name: Level 02
levels.award_verse: ...and with your feet fitted with the readiness that comes from the gospel of peace.

quiz.question: Who said 'Destroy this temple, and I will raise it again in three days'?
quiz.additional_info: Three days after His death, Jesus rose from the dead. The 'temple' he was referring to was Himself!

quiz.question: Who wrote 'The Spirit of God, who raised Jesus from the dead, lives in you'?
quiz.additional_info: We too have this awesome promise of eternal life through Jesus!

quiz.question: To whom did Jesus say 'I am the resurrection and the life. The one who believes in me will live, even though they die;'?
quiz.additional_info: This is really good news for believers!

quiz.question: Who wrote '...God’s love has been poured out into our hearts through the Holy Spirit, who has been given to us'?
quiz.additional_info: The Holy Spirit is God and He lives within us! More good news!

quiz.question: Who said 'I wish that all the LORD’s people were prophets and that the LORD would put his Spirit upon them all!'?
quiz.additional_info: God did exactly that! He put His Spirit within us! That's pretty cool!

quiz.question: Who said '...He will give you another Helper. He will be with you forever. He is the Spirit of Truth.'?
quiz.additional_info: The Holy Spirit leads us into all truth. He helps us to live the way God wants us to!

quiz.question: Who declared that 'the Spirit of the Lord spoke by me, and His word was on my tongue.'?
quiz.additional_info: Archaeologists consistently find evidence that biblical stories are accurate. The ancient "City of David" was discovered in 1867 proving David was a real person.

quiz.question: Who anointed David's head with oil?
quiz.additional_info: 'So Samuel took the horn of oil and anointed him...and from that day on the Spirit of the Lord came powerfully upon David.'

quiz.question: What prophet, the wife of Lappidoth, led Israel in the Book of Judges?
quiz.additional_info: God gives all His people special insight, wisdom and knowledge.

quiz.question: Who said: '...But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes on you;?'
quiz.additional_info: The Holy Spirit gives us power to reach other people! God wants us to tell them the good news about what Jesus did for us!

levels.name: Level 03
levels.award_verse: ...with the breastplate of righteousness in place,...

quiz.question: Who received the Ten Commandments from God on Mount Sinai?
quiz.additional_info: Obeying the Ten Commandments makes our lives better. They were provided for our benefit!

quiz.question: Who said "Do not think that I have come to abolish the Law or the Prophets; I have not come to abolish them but to fulfill them.?"
quiz.additional_info: Jesus kept all the commandments perfectly and fullfilled all the Old Testament prophecies.

quiz.question: In Jesus' parable about righteousness who was NOT justified before God?
quiz.additional_info: We are not saved by the good things we do, rather we are to do good things because we are saved.

quiz.question: Who wrote "There is none righteous, no, not one; there is no one who understands; there is no one who seeks after God."
quiz.additional_info: If you break one commandment, you have broken them all. Only Jesus is truely righteous.

quiz.question: Who said "...seek first His kingdom and His righteousness, and all these things will be added to you"?
quiz.additional_info: When we make God the center of our life, everything moves into its proper place.

quiz.question: Which prophet rebuked David for his evil actions?
quiz.additional_info: God still expects us to live righteous lives that reflect who we say we are.

quiz.question: Who said "I have not come to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance"?
quiz.additional_info: Only those that admit there sin, change their mind and accept Jesus are in right standing with God.

quiz.question: Who said to Jesus "You are the Messiah, the Son of the living God."?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus has called us into righteousness.

quiz.question: Who is Isaiah describing: "...my righteous servant will make it possible for many to be counted righteous..."?
quiz.additional_info: In 1947 a complete Isaiah Scroll was discovered dating to 100 years before Jesus. The contents prove the prophecies predate Jesus' birth. Once again confirming the authenticity of the Bible.

quiz.question: Who wrote "This righteousness is given through faith in Jesus Christ to all who believe."?
quiz.additional_info: God is good! He has made a way for us. Jesus

levels.name: Level 04
levels.award_verse: Stand firm then, with the belt of truth buckled around your waist,...

quiz.question: Who said "I am the way and the truth and the life."
quiz.additional_info: The Truth is that Jesus is the only way to heaven.

quiz.question: Who wrote in Proverbs: "The LORD detests lying lips, but he delights in those who tell the truth."'?
quiz.additional_info: God wants His words on our lips. His Word is Truth!

quiz.question: To whom did the Widow say "...you are a man of God and that the word of the LORD from your mouth is the truth."
quiz.additional_info: God is the Word! God isn't just truthful, God is Truth!

quiz.question: Who wrote "The tongue has the power of life and death, and those who love it will eat its fruit."
quiz.additional_info: Words have power! We have the choice to agree with what God says.

quiz.question: Who said "Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free."?
quiz.additional_info: This is so true! Don't just think about it. Follow Jesus and get set free!

quiz.question: To whom did Jesus say "I was born and came into the world is to testify to the truth. Everyone on the side of truth listens to me."
quiz.additional_info: We testify that Jesus is Lord! That He is the Truth

quiz.question:
Who said 
My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me."?
quiz.additional_info: God speaks! If we listen we will know His will for our lives.

quiz.question: Who said "Speak, for your servant is listening"?
quiz.additional_info: To hear God, we need to listen!

quiz.question: Who did God speak to in a "small still voice"?
quiz.additional_info: God favors small things! A word from God changes everything!

quiz.question: Who prayed "Sanctify them by the truth; your word is truth."?
quiz.additional_info: Thank you Jesus!

levels.name: Level 05
levels.award_verse: ... take up the shield of faith, with which you can extinguish all the flaming arrows of the evil one.

quiz.question: Who does the bible say "believed the Lord, and he credited it to him as righteousness."?
quiz.additional_info: We are saved by grace through faith in Jesus!

quiz.question: Who was Abraham's wife and said "God has made laughter for me; everyone who hears will laugh over me."
quiz.additional_info: God is always faithful! He keeps His promises

quiz.question: Who built an ark to save his family and the animals because God told him to?
quiz.additional_info: Sometimes it takes longer than we would like but what God says He will do, He does!

quiz.question: Who said "As were the days of Noah, so will be the coming of the Son of Man.?"
quiz.additional_info: One day Jesus will come back to set things right! Make sure you get in this boat!

quiz.question: Who said "There is no one holy like the LORD; there is no one besides you; there is no Rock like our God."?
quiz.additional_info: The Lord cares for us. He hears and answers our prayers!

quiz.question: Who said "...if you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mountain ‘Move from here to there,’ and it will move.
quiz.additional_info: All things are possible with God!

quiz.question: Who sang "The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer...in whom I take refuge, my shield and the horn my salvation."?
quiz.additional_info: Our God is our great defender!

quiz.question: Who said "Everyone then who hears these words of mine and does them will be like a wise man who built his house on the rock."?
quiz.additional_info: When Jesus is the foundation of our life, nothing can overcome us. We overcome because of His sacrifice and our testimony!

quiz.question: Who was told to "Strike the rock, and water will come out of it for the people to drink."?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus is our rock!

quiz.question: Who wrote "...for they drank from the spiritual rock that accompanied them and that rock was Christ."?
quiz.additional_info: Faith in Jesus leads to a life of purpose and fulfillment. Our God is always faithful!

levels.name: Level 06
levels.award_verse: ...and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.

quiz.question: Who said "Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will never pass away."?
quiz.additional_info: The bible is always true. It is God's Word.

quiz.question: Who wrote "...but the word of the Lord endures forever. And this is the word that was preached to you."?
quiz.additional_info: God's word never fails! God never fails!

quiz.question: Who said "For the sake of your word and according to your will, you have done this great thing and made it known to your servant."?
quiz.additional_info: There is no one like our God!

quiz.question: Who, when the Lord appeared to him with a sword in His hand, removed his sandles and worshipped Him?
quiz.additional_info: God is not here to take sides. He has come to take over. when we submit to Him the victory comes.

quiz.question: Who is John describing "In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God."?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus was there in the beginning!

quiz.question: Who defeated the Satan by quoting God's word?
quiz.additional_info: We also are given us authority over the enemy in Jesus' name!

quiz.question: Who said to Goliath "I come against you in the name of the Living God" before he killed him?
quiz.additional_info: Declare the word of God and watch your enemies fall!

quiz.question: Who was saved when God shut the mouths of the lions?
quiz.additional_info: God is might to save! He is always with us.

quiz.question: Who said"Fear not! Stand firm! And see the salvation of the Lord, which He will show you today."
quiz.additional_info: Jesus said "But be of good cheer. I have overcome the world.". Amen!

quiz.question: Who is John describing "He is dressed in a robe dipped in blood, and his name is the Word of God.?
quiz.additional_info: When Jesus returns it is gonna be awesome!

levels.name: Level 07
levels.award_verse: All around him was a glowing halo...

quiz.question: Who prayed from inside a fish to the Lord his God?
quiz.additional_info: No matter where you are or what is going on, God answers prayers!

quiz.question: Who prayed, "O Lord, now open their eyes and let them see."?
quiz.additional_info: If we could see how things really are, we would see God's angels all around us.

quiz.question: Who prayed "O my Lord, you only are our king; help me, who am alone and have no helper but you,...
quiz.additional_info: God is near to the broken hearted. He

quiz.question: Who said "I will never leave you nor forsake you"?
quiz.additional_info: This is a promise of God!

quiz.question: Who prayed to God three times a day every day?
quiz.additional_info: Prayer changes things!

quiz.question: Who prayed "Your name is in this temple. And we will cry out to You in our distress, and You will hear and deliver."?
quiz.additional_info: The battle belongs to the Lord!

quiz.question: Who prayed "Our Father in heaven, hallowed be your name, your kingdom come, your will be done..."?
quiz.additional_info: Our God is a good Father!

quiz.question: Who prayed "...answer me, so these people will know that you, Lord, are God, and that you are turning their hearts back again."?
quiz.additional_info: There really is a God! There really are answers! Jesus really does change hearts!

quiz.question: Who prayed "May the Lord our God be with us...may he never leave us nor forsake us. May he turn our hearts to him..."?
quiz.additional_info: That is a good prayer!

quiz.question: Who said "I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me."?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus came to restore our relationship with the Father. The answer to all our prayers!

levels.name: Level 08
levels.award_verse: They will soar on wings like eagles...

quiz.question: Who, in a dream, saw a stairway going from earth to heaven with angels of God ascending and descending on it?
quiz.additional_info: Our God has made a way for us to go to heaven!

quiz.question: Who said "...you will see heaven open, and the angels of God ascending and descending on the Son of Man."?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus is the "Son of Man" and He is our only ladder to heaven!

quiz.question: Who saw the "Son of Man" be presented an everlasting Kingdom in a night vision?
quiz.additional_info: "and behold, with the clouds of heaven there came one like a son of man,and he came to the Ancient of Days!"
